QuestData.Title: Losing Gracefully
QuestData.Description: The Aldor have gained the favor of the Sha'tar today. As if that should come as any sort of surprise!$B$BWatch them showing off their fancy footwork a few feet away from A'dal. Could they possibly put any more effort into sucking up to the naaru?$B$BHarbinger Haronem's marksman regiment is so dedicated, it even brings its own cooking pot to avoid taking long breaks for lunch. This cannot go without retribution, $n.$B$BI want you to pour this vial into their meal. The results should be... comical.
QuestData.LogDescription: Magister Falris in Shattrath wants you to take the Vial of Sedative Serum to the Terrace of Light and pour it into Haronem's Regiment Cooking Pot.
QuestData.CompletionText: The smell of herbs and spices fills the air around the pot.
QuestData.RewardText: The Aldor marksmen appear distracted with their drill, allowing you ample time to place the contents of the vial into the stew.
